price: Rárá. (À ń jẹ́) Alágbára láti to eegun ọmọníka rẹ̀ dọ́gba.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ
footnotes: 1.Àwọn ọmọníka ọwọ́ àti ọmọníka ẹsẹ̀, ọ̀tún rẹ̀ àti òsì rẹ̀. Ẹ tún wo sūrah al-Wāƙi‘ah; 56:60-61 àti sūrah al-Mọ̄‘rij; 70:40-41.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
